subtitle: happy Purim
one of the great challenges and
questions in life is how do we create
change
whether we're in a negative situation
and we'd like to get into a positive one
or we're in a good place but we want it
to be better to improve
Purim contains the answer
get out of your comfort zone
Purim is a day when we have the power to
turn ourselves inside out and outside in
that which is concealed becomes revealed
and the reveal becomes concealed there's
something that happens when we get out
of our comfort zone a shift
a change that generates change
so on this Purim
I'd like to wish you
may you be turned inside out upside down
and outside end
may your masks be masked and may your
insides be unmasked
mayor continents Shine from within as
you meet yourself face to face
may your masquerade no longer be needed
as the shrouds fade away
may your child smile and dance as the
facade is lifted may you just be
happy Purim
